mapper.sql: plan_number AS "planNumber",making_number AS "makingNumber", production_plan_detail_id AS "productionPlanDetailId", production_plan_id AS "productionPlanId",order_detail_id AS "orderDetailId", sku_id AS "skuId", delivery_date AS "deliveryDate", create_user AS "createUser", deptId AS "deptId", display AS "display", update_time AS "updateTime", create_time AS "createTime", update_user AS "updateUser" , contract_id AS "contractId"
mapper.select:
select
from daoxin_production_plan_detail where 1 = 1
and production_plan_detail_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionPlanDetailId},'%')
and production_plan_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.productionPlanId},'%')
and sku_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.skuId},'%')
and plan_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.planNumber},'%')
and delivery_date like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deliveryDate},'%')
and create_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createUser},'%')
and deptId like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.deptId},'%')
and display like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.display},'%')
and update_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateTime},'%')
and create_time like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.createTime},'%')
and update_user like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.updateUser},'%')
and contract_id like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.contractId},'%')
